metadata.name: Google_W_0013_links_files_outside_domain
metadata.author: Deloitte
metadata.description: This rule detects emails sends outside the domain and contains files or links

ruleText:
rule Google_W_0013_links_files_outside_domain 
{

  meta:
    name = "Google_W_0013_links_files_outside_domain"
    author = "Deloitte"
    description = "This rule detects emails sends outside the domain and contains files or links"
    severity = "Medium"
    // mitre_attack_tactic = ""
    // mitre_attack_technique = ""

  events:
    $e.metadata.event_type = "EMAIL_TRANSACTION"
    $e.metadata.log_type = "WORKSPACE_ACTIVITY" 
    $e.metadata.vendor_name = "Google Workspace"
    $e.principal.administrative_domain != /@iaec.gov\.il$/ or $e.about.domain.name != /@iaec.gov\.il$/ 
    $e.network.smtp.rcpt_to = /@iaec.gov\.il$/
    $e.principal.user.email_addresses != /@iaec.gov\.il$/
    $e.principal.application = "smtp-inbound"
    $e.about.file.file_type = "FILE_TYPE_PDF" //PDF 
    or $e.about.file.file_type = "FILE_TYPE_XLSX" //EXCEL
    or $e.about.file.file_type ="FILE_TYPE_JPEG" 
    or $e.about.file.file_type ="FILE_TYPE_DOCX" //DOCS
    or $e.about.file.file_type ="FILE_TYPE_DOC" //DOC
    or $e.about.file.file_type = "FILE_TYPE_PNG" 
    or $e.about.file.file_type = "FILE_TYPE_EMAIL_TYPE" 
    or $e.about.file.file_type = "FILE_TYPE_PE_EXE" //exe
    or $e.about.file.file_type ="FILE_TYPE_HTML" //HTML
    or $e.about.file.file_type = "FILE_TYPE_JAVASCRIPT" //Javascript
    or $e.about.file.file_type = "FILE_TYPE_VBA"
    or $e.about.file.file_type = "FILE_TYPE_LNK" //links 
    or $e.about.file.file_type = "FILE_TYPE_JAR" //Java 
    or $e.about.file.file_type = "FILE_TYPE_ISOIMAGE" //Disk
    or $e.about.file.file_type = "FILE_TYPE_PPT" //Powerpoint
    or $e.about.file.file_type = "FILE_TYPE_DMG" //mac
    or $e.about.file.file_type = "FILE_TYPE_RTF" 
    or $e.about.file.file_type = "FILE_TYPE_ANDROID" //apk 
    or $e.about.file.file_type = "FILE_TYPE_POWERSHELL" //PS
    or $e.about.file.file_type = "FILE_TYPE_ZIP" //ZIP


    //$e.security_result.category = "MAIL_SPAM"
    // not (net.ip_in_range_cidr($e.intermediary.ip,"10.0.0.0/8") 
    // or net.ip_in_range_cidr($e.intermediary.ip,"172.16.0.0/12") 
    // or net.ip_in_range_cidr($e.intermediary.ip,"192.168.0.0/16")) 


  condition:
    $e
}
